sentences.en: A post mortem examination found that she died from asphyxiation.
sentences.cn: 尸检结果发现她死于窒息。

sentences.en: Evidence is given on oath and witnesses are subject to cross - examination .
sentences.cn: 证人宣誓后作证,并接受 盘问.

sentences.en: Further examination is needed to exclude the chance of disease.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步检查以排除患病的可能。

sentences.en: He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
sentences.cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

sentences.en: He walked towards the examination room with leaden feet ( = slowly ).
sentences.cn: 他像脚灌了铅一样地走向考场.

sentences.en: He’s already taken the entrance examination.
sentences.cn: 他已经参加了入学考试。

sentences.en: How well does this thesis stand up to close examination?
sentences.cn: 这个命题经得起推敲吗？

sentences.en: I'm going to ask the teacher to look my examination paper out.
sentences.cn: 我打算请老师把我的考卷找出来.

sentences.en: If the examination shows your company enjoys basically good health, read on.
sentences.cn: 要是审查表明你们公司的运营状况基本良好，请继续往下读。

sentences.en: On further examination it was found that the signature was not genuine.
sentences.cn: 经过进一步的调查发现签名不是真的.

sentences.en: Several suggestions for possible examination questions were thrown out by the teacher.
sentences.cn: 老师就哪些问题可能作为试题作了几点提示.

sentences.en: She was given exemption from the final examination.
The events in Los Angeles have sparked a new national self-examination.
sentences.cn: 发生在洛杉矶的事件再次引发了全国范围的反思。

sentences.en: The examination results will be announced in September.

sentences.cn: 这些问题需要进一步考察。

sentences.en: The proposal requires careful examination and consideration.
sentences.cn: 那项提议需要经过仔细研究和考虑。

sentences.en: The proposals are still under examination.
sentences.cn: 那些提案还在审查之中。

sentences.en: They found invasive cancer during a routine examination.
sentences.cn: 他们在常规体检中发现了扩散性的癌变。

sentences.en: You will need to have a routine biannual examination.
sentences.cn: 你得接受一年两次的例行检查。

words.tran_cn: 应试者；受审查者；受检查者
检验员；主考人；[专利] 审查员
检查；调查； 检测；考试

phrases.tran_cn: 考试结果，成绩；核赔结论
显微镜检查；微观组织检查；金相试验

trans.tran_en: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one
